biotools.summary: MetaPlatanus is a de novo assembler for metagenome (microbiome). The features of this tool are as follows: (1) It can utilize various types of long-range information such as Oxford-Nanopore/PacBio long reads, mate-pairs (jumping libraries), and 10x linked reads (experimental). (2) Coverage depths, k-mer frequencies and results of the binning tool are also employed to extend sequences and correct mis-assemblies, reducing inter-species misassemblies. (3) Contig-assembly, scaffolding, gap-closing and binning are automatically executed at once. (4) MetaPlatanus requires at least one short-read paired-end library.
